#define DO_ALLOC ( inDLL,
TT,
var,
...   ) 

Value:

{ \
        void *p = Allocate<TT>(inDLL); \
        if(p) { \
                var = new (p) TT(__VA_ARGS__); \
        } else { \
                ExitProcess(1); \
        } \
} \

#define DO_ALLOC_ARR ( inDLL,
TT,
Capacity,
var   ) 

Value:

{ \
        void *p = Allocate_Array<TT>(inDLL, Capacity); \
        if(p) { \
                var = new (p) TT[Capacity]; \
        } else { \
                ExitProcess(1); \
        } \
} \
